text: Mary Alden (18 June 1883 â€“ 2 July 1946) was an American actress. She acted in Hollywood and on Broadway. She was in a lot of popular movies. Those included Birth of a Nation in 1915 and Ladies of the Mob in 1928. Alden was born in New York. She died in Los Angeles at age sixty-three. title: Mary Alden
